item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Various Artists (FLAC and Lossless)
item.description:

Thanks a lot in advance!

item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - Faithless - Champion Sound ( Album 2025)
item.description:
​


Artist: Faithless
Title: Champion Sound
Year Of Release: 2025
Label: Self Released
Genre: Electronic
Quality: Mp3 320 kbps / FLAC (tracks)
Total Time: 01:15:42
Total Size: 174 / 459 MB

https://music.apple.com/gb/album/champion-sound/1818363995

Tracklist:

CD1
1. Forever Free (1:35)
2. In Your Own Groove (feat. LSK) (4:53)
3. Fugitive (7:24)
4. Peace and Noise (3:00)

CD2
1. Meeting (feat. Nathan Ball & Amelia Fox) (5:30)
2. Driving (feat. Nathan Ball, Amelia Fox, Suli Breaks & MAX RAD) (3:51)
3. Thinking (feat. Nathan Ball & Amelia Fox) (8:17)

CD3
1. Champion Sound: Side 3 Book of Hours (24:05)

CD4
1. Find a Way (3:02)
2. Dollars and Dimes (feat. Bebe Rexha) (2:48)
3. Champion Sound (feat. LSK) (2:31)
4. Emmanuel (4:28)
5. Yes I Want It Too (4:18)

In a history that stretches back some 25 years, Faithless have long occupied a pivotal position in the world of British electronica. Marrying elements of house, trip-hop, dub and a songwriting flair into arena-filling, explosive, euphoric dance floor classics. Their accomplishments tell their own story: seven Top 10 singles, six Top 10 albums (three at Number 1), a Mercury Prize nomination for their brilliant sophomore album, 1998’s ‘Sunday 8PM’ and their impressive four times Platinum certified ‘Forever Faithless -The Greatest Hits’ adding to a career total in excess of 15 million sales worldwide.

item.author: Shpak
